item.title: Please finally cover these two graffiti tags (Montpellier Rd/Queens Rd), 9th December
item.description:
I've requested the removal of these tags for over a year now. Because those requests have been repeatedly ignored, the building has now been covered in even more graffiti. Please finally take action and remove it and the other tags that have now been sprayed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 97, Queen's Road, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Half a meter pothole on the pavement, 9th December
item.description:
This pothole on the pavement has been here for more than 6 months now. Can this please be fixed as during cold icy mornings the pothole is icy and someone can slip and injure themselves. Also it often gets filled with water when it rains and a lot of elderly people live on this street and may slip and injure themselves when it it wet and slippery and dog walkers too.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Degema Road, Chislehurst, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drains either side of the road, 9th December
item.description:
Whenever it rains both drains at the bottom of poverest road by the traffic light junction get blocked. People are unable to freely walk on the pavement through fear of being splashed by vehicles who cannot avoid the flooding as it gets that severe.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Poverest Road, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
